dialog_B.content: Hello!

May I talk with you?
I think that would be a great idea. It sounds like you are really feeling guilty about the situation and want to rebuild the relationship with someone.

dialog_A.content: Hello!

dialog_A.content: Hello!

It seems like you are struggling with how to approach things. I think it' s great that you are reaching out to people who have a common sense of what is going on. How are you feeling about this? Are you aware that there are some bad manners within your community?

Sometimes I will listen to their talk to confirm that they are not talking with me.
